attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe the logo for London 2012 is the biggest waste of £400,000 British taxpayer’s money and request a free online competition to decide the replacement be started with immediate effect and, an inquiry be set up into this expenditure to deem whom is responsible for authorising this ridiculous amount of money being spent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
